description: rounded top, bottom and edges resemble folding; applied round element at one side, split by cover and box; light grey glaze on interior; tan and orange on exterior with slip decorated linear pattern
life_date: American (St. Paul, Minnesota; born Gaylord, Minnesota), born 1951
markings: \'JF [intertwined]\', stamped into clay, on underside of lid and bottom at one corner; circle surrounding 4 wavy lines, stamped into clay, on underside of lid; \'37 Jill Franke/St. Paul, MN/covered box, wood fired/stoneware/$200.00\', on sticker, on bottom
title: Covered Box
